import React, { useEffect } from "react"; import Header from "../../components/header/Header"; import imageProfile from "../../assets/profil.jpeg"; import { useTransactionStore } from "../../store"; function Profile() { const userProfileState = useTransactionStore((state) => state); useEffect(() => { userProfileState.fetchUserProfiles(); }, []); return (

Some quick example text to build on the card title and make up the bulk of the card's content.

Profile Details
Name {userProfileState.userProfiles.name}
Email {userProfileState.userProfiles.email}
Phone Number
Role User
Referral Code
Balance {Intl.NumberFormat("id-ID").format( userProfileState.userProfiles.balance )}
Edit Profile
); } export default Profile;
